forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely after 1pm. Cloudy. High near 50, with temperatures falling to around 37 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 24 to 29 mph, with gusts as high as 46 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 3pm, then a chance of rain and snow showers between 3pm and 4pm, then a chance of rain and snow showers between 4pm and 5pm, then a chance of rain and snow showers. nubsNob.comments: The Snow Crew turned the guns on last night. Despite some cold temperatures in the area the conditions at Nub's Nob allowed for only a few hours of quality snowmaking. The team is here around the clock, ready for the next opportunity. At this point it looks like there is a turn toward colder weather right around Thanksgiving. We will continue to update the blog to keep you up to date. Think COLD and SNOW.
